website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate booster seat for those who prioritize convenience, safety, and durability.
pros: Features color-coded belt guides to ensure proper seat belt positioning
Offers user-friendly push-button lower connectors to secure the booster seat to the vehicle when not in use
Boasts a soft-knit, stylish appearance that is sure to make you smile
cons: Belt positioning clip can be difficult to use
Less padding in contrast to similar Britax booster seats

customer_reviews.title: Still love Britax - comfort and safety top notch!
customer_reviews.text: I am a firm believer of buying Britax, used with with all 3 of my children. Unfortunately, I replaced my Britax Parkway SGL with the Britax Highpoint (after a car accident) and it is very difficult to get the seat belt tight around my daughter and the belt positioning clip is difficult to use. We did not have any issues with the Parkway SGL. Still love the safety, the look, and the comfort of the new Highpoint but more difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S LeClere

customer_reviews.title: Great Older Child Booster!
customer_reviews.text: We love this booster seat! Daughter is turning 9 years old and we needed something safe but more narrow than our other Britax harness booster. Love the adjustable crotch strap for even more safety. Just another great product from Britax. Definitely for older children, I would not use this with my 4 year old. (Even with the starting weight 40lbs child) Definitely need a maturity of understanding when using a lap belt booster.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Have always been happy with Britax... maybe didn't need one this time.
customer_reviews.text: The red plastic under the handles makes it difficult to put the lap belt in place but otherwise seems fine. Adjusting the belly strap is kind of annoying and it's unclear what purpose it serves. I think I'd have been okay with a non-Britax product.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Holmes

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old, soon to be 6 was ready for a Big Girl car seat, have always purchased Britax for my children, so this was my natural go-to. So easy to install, easy to interchange in seats and vehicles, and she LOVES the color! Did a lot of research, and am very happy with an affordable Britax option.
customer_reviews.author: Chach

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this - but belt does not stay secure enough.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this seat as well as the safety ratings and I've had a britax since my children were born. However, I am unable to get the belt snug enough around my child (seems I'm not the only one either). It remains loose on the lap no matter what I do. I have used other boosters / highback and backless and not had this issue. My child is 7 years old and feels unsafe while strapped in and the extra backless booster we have (another brand) keeps her more secure. I really wanted to love this.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Snow

customer_reviews.title: Not qualify
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, very flimsy, and feels like it will fall apart just picking it up. Only bonus of this booster is how well it places the seat belt strap.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Liponoga

customer_reviews.title: Love Britax for years!
customer_reviews.text: Due to recent car accident, we had to replace 2 car sears. We went with this booster seat instead of another Britax car seat we previously had due to child's age. Knowing how crazy some people are driving and seeing what could happen to the car in these accidents, I feel my 9,5 y.o. is much safer in high back booster sear. He is average 9 y.o. and this seat works perfectly for him! He takes high back booster seat over any booster because of comfort level. Now, I am not so sure about cup holders on this seat, we used to Pioneer and Frontier where it's not removable and larger, but it serves the purpose. Highly recommend this seat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great seat. I transitioned my 4 year old daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. I transitioned my 4 year old daughter into this and she says it's very comfortable. It's a pretty color as well which she likes. She's able to unbuckle it fairly easily but still needs me to buckle it so far. Goes in and comes out extremely easy, (I could never figure out our car seat before this.) Overall, very impressed with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight easy to install easy to take off and wash the fabric the only thing I didn't care for which it is an older kids seat but I would like to have the tether on the back just for extra safety to be able to not only strap it down on both sides but then on the back but obviously it doesn't come with it so not a big deal but it would be awesome if it did
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, possible design flaw
customer_reviews.text: So I would love to give this product a five star review as it is extremely sturdy and well-made however on nearly a daily basis our very smart eight-year-old daughter cannot seem to get the seatbelt strap through the little red loop that it goes through in the car seat. Seems to always get stuck and I’m always having to get out and pull the strap through for her.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkiquinones

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, easily moved to other cars.
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat! It's very comfortable for my child, and super easy to take in and out of the car as needed. Installs quickly and easily. The head rest is easy adjustable as they grow, too. It's also a night material that is easy to keep clean. Removing the cup holders for cleaning is also very simple.
customer_reviews.author: kliz22

customer_reviews.title: Delivered with a hole in the fabric!
customer_reviews.text: We love Britax brand. We’ve tried other brands and always come back to Britax. However it’s the first time we’ve ordered through Amazon. Previously we always purchased directly at Babies R Us. Unfortunately that’s no longer an option so we ordered through Amazon. Our chair was delivered with a hole in the fabric. I admit I’m a bit disappointed. But can’t do anything about it until Monday. I can say it was super simple set up. But my daughter says it’s very comfortable. She’s 5 yrs old, 54lbs, and 45” tall.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bazan

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster Seat
customer_reviews.text: This is the second booster I bought. I first bought a Chico high back booster and did not like it at all. This seat seems to have more side impact protection, more comfortable and better appearance. With the Chico my 5 year would fall asleep and slump forward horribly. We tried everything we could to correct the problem with no improvement. With the Britax he has fallen asleep and he does not slump front or way to the side. His head rest within the head rest.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: bought two
customer_reviews.text: my grand daughter doesnt like it because the back is to stright up when strapped in at the bottom of the car seat hooks pushing her to much forward it is uncomfortable for her I had to put a spacer between the bottom of the auto seat and the child seat 4x4 piece of wood so the back had some lean back to it
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice and Easy for Kids to use.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 Frontier Booster seats and we bought this one to try as well. We love that my daughter can strap herself in without assistance. The install is not as easy as the click tight system but you will find it easy and comfortable for the kids. I hope that this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great booster
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old is very comfortable in it. I love the safety features. Very similar to a full car seat without the five point harness. I like the strap in the bottom that prevents the lap belt from riding too high. Easy to install. If I need a booster for the second car, will buy the same one.
customer_reviews.author: saint garius

customer_reviews.title: The Beltpath does not allow belt to tighten.
customer_reviews.text: The belt path design for this booster, is not great at all. You have to waste a lot of time tighting the belt manually, because the booster won't allow the seatbelt to retract on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: MAR Evolve

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat! My daughter says it should get 5 and a half stars if 5 is the most. She says it is very comfortable and easy to figure out for her.
customer_reviews.author: Peace-A

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: An easy to install car seat. We use it for our secondary vehicle, but my kid says it is comfortable. I like how it has a little extra side safety than the normal booster.
customer_reviews.author: Jessila

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: Its full of features like cupholders, which is great, but in the end we need this to be safe and comfortable. Seems to fit the bill, this is our 4th Britax and compared to gracos and others, they tend to be much heavier and sturdier. I like the seat belt clip that ensures the belt is in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: mark.nickerson

customer_reviews.title: great car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this booster. I've had 3 other Britax and loved them all. The back is not too straight which is something I read in the reviews, and we have it in an extended cab truck that won't recline. Soft and comfortable. The side impact protection and the lap belt positioning clip are the safely features that sold me.
customer_reviews.author: Vikigator1

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr old requested a new booster- with a back, because in a backless booster when she falls asleep in the car her head flops all over. This prevents that. She reports it is comfortable. Has more room for her to grow too.
customer_reviews.author: mastack

customer_reviews.title: Quality assures safety
customer_reviews.text: Well made and safety feature rich high back booster seat from Britax. Had their carseats when my children were younger and my trusted manufacturer for quality child seats. Chose this over the Midpoint because for a slight increase in price, have additional safety feature and peace of mind knowing my child is protected properly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Bought again immediately after!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is perfect and much better than I had expected. It’s high quality, durable, comfortable, and user friendly. My 5 year old is proud that she can buckle herself in. I ended up buying a 2nd seat for my husbands vehicle😊
customer_reviews.author: TJR

customer_reviews.title: I wish seat was a few inches wider...
customer_reviews.text: I wish the seat base was a few inches wider. The crotch strap is extra, and not comfortable for child. Easy to install and clip to back seat is easy to clip on and off when changing to our other car. The belt clip keeps seat belt at length we need and less fighting with the seat belt. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: saray

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good one
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice high back booster. I juts wish it wasn’t so straight. When we take longer car rides and he falls asleep he looks really uncomfortable trying to stay up. I wish there were car seats that recline
customer_reviews.author: Tiz

customer_reviews.title: Great seat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-constructed seat. The seatbelt guides make it easy for my 8 year old to know if he has the seat belt positioned correctly on his lap. It’s so lightweight, so it was super easy to take with us when we traveled.
customer_reviews.author: E. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brand!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we owned a Roemer seat for 13 years and it was such a good product. Roemer is manufactured in Germany and is a top child seat. Here in the US we found Britax which what we saw belongs to Roemer and we were again positively surprised. Everything from the package to the design, the materials, the warranty, is top. This model comes with increased safety such as highpoint belt-positioning and ISOFIX. All around a top brand you can trust. Enjoy the travel with the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.text: Good seat. My son finds it comfortable. He has a hard time buckling it himself because of how the seat sits but it’s easy for an adult. I will buy the same one again for my other son.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Britax never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand Britax. This is our 4th Britax. We decided on this one because we were traveling and needed a lightweight, but safe booster seat for the car rental. Very pleased. It now serves as an extra booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: H.Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great seat! Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat! Easy to install. My son loves it. It seems very comfortable and easy for him to get in and out of. Other reviews talk about how it takes a lot of time to install. I found quite the opposite. This is the quickest, easiest, seats I have owned. I would recommend the seat to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: J. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and simple
customer_reviews.text: With the extended car seat laws going into effect this year, I am thankful to have such a simple and easy to use nice high back booster for my kids that are not quite tall enough to sit independently
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great seat at a more affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I love the added hook on the front to keep it on his lap even though it does make it a little bit more to unhook to get in and out. Great product. My son loves that his head doesn't flop around like it did in his cheaper seat. Bought this as a backup for his frontier. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seats but hard to tighten into place
customer_reviews.text: This is a great booster seat. They were fairly easy to install but hard to tighten the straps that connect to the seat anchors. We drove cross country and my kids didn’t complain about being uncomfortable in the seats like they did with their previous Britax booster seats.
customer_reviews.author: grahamic

customer_reviews.title: Britex always deliveries !
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install! The belt between the legs is what sold me on this model. I have always used Britex and I tell every parent to use them ! WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat it’s a little wide from my car making it difficult for my little one to put seatbelt on otherwise it’s a great seat for those with kids who are taller than the average kid.
customer_reviews.author: Martel and Jenn

customer_reviews.title: I love the height limit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old son to ride in because it had higher limits than most high back seats. It is so soft and comfortable! He loves it. I'm going to buy another for our second vehicle because he doesnt like the standard booster seat that does not have a high back on it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon kimes

customer_reviews.title: Son is happy.. wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. My son has gone through several complaining about comfort. This one is the best. No complaints on long car trips now.
customer_reviews.author: Firestorm_Hellkite_

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Like that it has latch to keep it in place. Also really enjoy the part that comes up between the legs similar to a car seat to hold the buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster with a Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: I have loved all of our Britax car seats from infant to now the booster, however; if I have one complaint on this booster it is that the center belt holder is not well designed. The material cover comes out of the seat each and every time my daughter gets out which means I have to stuff it back in each and every time I put her back in. It’s an unnecessary annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy/Safe/Convenient Carseat for Convertible to Belt Positioning Booster
customer_reviews.text: Thus was easy to install and lightweight enough for my 6 year old to carry it (with a little effort lol). Its unfortunate that it does not transition to a backless booster seat because I'll have to do this all over again once this carseat is outgrown. But I do very much like this seat and I feel safe with my child riding in it for now.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Great seat my 3 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat my 3 year old grandson love the extra room and now he has a place to but his bottle and juice cup 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Renita

customer_reviews.title: Two Year Old Car Seat!!
customer_reviews.text: When the car seat arrived, the date of manufacture was 2 years ago. Car seats have a life span of 6 years, so this seat only has 4 years of use left. Not worth the price at all.
customer_reviews.author: Evan W Thomas

customer_reviews.title: We love this booster!!
customer_reviews.text: Another Britax homerun! This booster is easy to use correctly and well made and designed! I’ve used a lot of booster seats over the years and this is by far my favorite!!!
customer_reviews.author: Boymom, RN

customer_reviews.title: top quality seat !! slow shipping
customer_reviews.text: This seat is very good quality...this is the second one I purchased. very easy to install and for the kids to use. 2 cup holders a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Bugs

customer_reviews.title: Britax low point
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem to be tight against the seat. The seat belt holds the child in, not like the regular child seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A. Paris

customer_reviews.title: Best booster seat ever
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this car seat - i love how it is sturdy , it’s stable and for the first time i feel like she’s safe
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Valko

customer_reviews.title: Good old Britax car seat-great as always!
customer_reviews.text: It is great, easy to install. My 8 year old was able to install his own cup holders. Colors are pretty buy should be easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't recline
customer_reviews.text: I love the Britax car seats but this one didn't seem as good of quality as most. It doesn't recline, so if you don't have a vehicle that reclines your child has to sit straight up.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster!
customer_reviews.text: Have had Britax boosters in the past and this so far is the best. Fits my 7 year old daughter well
customer_reviews.author: Holly R.

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: Good product and my daughter loves it. However, this is not a good seat to put in the middle. I have three children and my older two are 12 and 13. When my 5 year old rides in my four door sedan this seat did not work as it leaned right and left on my other children at ever corner. So I use this seat in my suv with third row seating that that the seat is more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Harmon Stockdale

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install! Attractive car seat, and the lap belt positioning clip is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: JJ7

customer_reviews.title: Best booster
customer_reviews.text: I love this booster seat so much! I ended up getting 3 total. We already had a safety 1st grow and go, and a diono radian. I pick this over those any day.
customer_reviews.author: Haley/Cody

customer_reviews.title: The model under this works as well
customer_reviews.text: Live this carseat, but the center strap is pretty useless. Not worth the extra money for this model. It is very hard to get the seat belt into the guide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this seat. It was easy to install and is exactly as described. Love the color and the material seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tcook

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great booster but my daughter wouldnt use the belt positioning so that was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Winograd

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this seat. It’s the most comfortable seat yet. We bought 3! It’s roomy. Great head and side impact coverage! My kids are 8.5 and 10 years old. Keep them safer longer in this seat!
customer_reviews.author: Holly M. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Harness please
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a 5 star if it had the harness but I guess that’s why they cut the price. Brutal shame on you
customer_reviews.author: chinel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product but one issue - we bought two - one for our vehicle Honda CRV & one for our daughter - she has a Toyota. It is easier for our grandson to clip in their seatbelt latch than ours.
customer_reviews.author: A Nana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect booster!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and safe for my toddler! Even he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for older kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: We recently upgraded our 7 year old to this seat. It's been great! It's easy to install, and still uses the latch system. He is comfortable and able to buckle and unbuckle himself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great transition from harness car seat
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is a great transition from our previous Britax Advocate click tight. The booster seat is light to lift and my 6 year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this car seat has an extra buckle for protection!!
customer_reviews.author: Bk

customer_reviews.title: Safety, safety safety, it does its job
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on Amazon, easy to install, easy to move between cars. My son loved being in it. 2 weeks after I bought it (last weekend), we were stopped and a car rear ended us going about 35-40mph. My son (~40lbs), who was in this seat, was totally fine. No headache, backache, nothing. Other occupants in our car were not so fortunate. I'm buying another one right now.
customer_reviews.author: LTWU

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for an 8 years old
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4ft 6 is comfortably fits it his seat. The side support is much better than in the previous version.
customer_reviews.author: AA shopper

customer_reviews.title: Feels safer than other one
customer_reviews.text: SO much better than the last one. Has better neck support and she can stay in it longer.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Searched and search for a booster seat for my twins. One is 50lbs and the other 40lbs. Love the cushioning, the fact it can be attached to seat, has adjustable back, is light weight, and has the slide belt for between the legs also.
customer_reviews.author: JWill

customer_reviews.title: For the money you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this booster seat. It's made very well and has some cool features that other booster seats didnt have.
customer_reviews.author: erin mckinnon

customer_reviews.title: Love Britax
customer_reviews.text: Went back and forth between models- This one is great. Easy install, I like the fabric- cup holders, lightweight- excellent safety features. Will get two kids out of this one!
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 6 year old and he loves it. Super nice and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Field

customer_reviews.title: Problem with seat belt getting stuck
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes we have a problem with the seat belt getting stuck and child not able to pull it and adjust to fit. I have to get out of the car and try to pull it out. Car is a Toyota RAV4 and we also have to take out the headrest when the booster seat was installed..
customer_reviews.author: Norma Trias

customer_reviews.title: Not secure
customer_reviews.text: When brakes are hit headrest goes forward and not secure.
customer_reviews.author: We love Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Yes to this booster
customer_reviews.text: Yes, yes, yes to a great booster seat. I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: It was not as I expected I want it to fit my child who is over weight
customer_reviews.author: Coffeelover

customer_reviews.title: Confortable & Safe
customer_reviews.text: My Girl like the carseat and is easy to handle. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Buy the CLICK TIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Best car seat we have ever purchased!! The click tight system is PHENOMENAL! Nothing on the market like it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L. Schjott

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my very tiny 6 year old. She loves them! They look great and are very comfortable. We have tried 5 different car seats over the years and by far these are our favs!
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Over a 2 month period i have done hours of research to find the seat for us, and this it! after using it for a year or so i'm glad we made this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Ward

customer_reviews.title: safty / protective features are great.i like that is can be anchored securely to the car .
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this carseat.My son loves it.It is very well built and as far as safety I highly recommend this particular item.very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good option for those not yet ready for a backless booster.
customer_reviews.text: I love the extra safety features like the lap belt and shoulder strap postioners!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna H.

customer_reviews.title: Great booster !
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item on Saturday it arrived today on Wednesday. I love the material the durability feel about it and the safety it offers. We have only ridden in it 2 times so far but we love it !
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We returned this product right away. It was so uncomfortable for my son.
customer_reviews.author: FL Momma

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: Safety features are exceptional. Sits straight up. Child gets tired and unable to lean
customer_reviews.author: Linda G

customer_reviews.title: Picky
customer_reviews.text: We have a very picky 6 year old and he loves this seat! Very easy to install and use!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great booster for kids over 5 years old
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. My twins are 6 & fit well in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Cleinmark

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and it is super easy to switch between vehicles and is very comfortable. The clip between the legs makes my daughter feel safer and keeps her in when she falls asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: This carset is easy to install and we really like it really secures our granddaughter in well.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Emery

customer_reviews.title: car seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car booster seat for my grand daughter. She uses the same seat in other cars so she is familiar with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Blore

customer_reviews.title: comfortable for long rides
customer_reviews.text: My kid is quite tall and this booster fits the perfect! Also it really comfortable for long rides and for a nap)
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Keeps a squirmy 5 year old in his seat.
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat. It keeps my 5 year old in place really well.
customer_reviews.author: steve Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Best booster.
customer_reviews.text: Great piece. Seems durable than most child seats I tried out and very easy to install and dismantle.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves it and I do too!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Denton Gandia

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price ♡ keeps my daughter safe.
customer_reviews.text: Could have a little more cushion and I didn't think it would as hard as it was to install personally.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mcadams

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for the children
customer_reviews.text: I love the it was easy to install, comfortable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good booster
customer_reviews.text: Really like this booster compared to some of the other brands. Feels sturdy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: My mini me

customer_reviews.title: Fit is small
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is nice but has much less padding than the Britax Parkway and is narrower in the shoulder area. Older child did not like the fit and found the seatbelt guide between legs in an awkward position. The seat is lightweight and user friendly but the fit is poor when you are on the larger end of the high-back booster range.
customer_reviews.author: Emo

customer_reviews.title: Best seat evaaaaa
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, best purchase for sure! It’s easy to install, very nice fabric (easy to keep clean) and it is indeed comfortable as my kid for the first time since his baby seat wants to put on the safety belt, usually it was difficult as he was uncomfortable with it, but with this britax he is perfectly fine, already proved with a long trip and a four hour long drive and not even one “take off the belt”! Btw my son if four ;)
customer_reviews.author: Nik@

customer_reviews.title: Extra lower slot for seatbelt positioning
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install and has a slot to hold seat belt low on thighs. On long drive grandson said seat not as comfortable as his old car seat he outgrew. He can fasten and unfasten himself making getting in and out easier,
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I love the anchors! Perfect for the transition from the 5 point harness.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

product_meta.title: Britax Highpoint Highback Belt-Positioning Booster Car Seat | 3 Layer Impact Protection - 40 to 120 Pounds, Seaglass
product_meta.description: Color:SeaglassCruising with your big kid is a breeze when the Highpoint Belt Positioning Booster is in your backseat. Color coded vehicle belt guides make it easy to position the vehicle seat belt safely across the upper thighs, while flexible push button lower connectors secure the booster seat to the vehicle when not in use. Use this booster seat as your child grows; the 10 position quick adjust headrest easily adjusts to keep up. The Highpoint Booster Seat features three layers of side impact protection to absorb crash forces, keeping your child safe. Plus, the soft knit, stylish fashion is sure to turn heads when you pull up in the car pool line. Two dishwasher safe, removable cup holders keep drinks and snacks within reach, and are easy to remove and clean between rides. The Highpoint booster can be used 40 120 pounds, child standing height 38 63 inches. Dimensions minimum 27.5 H x 21.5 W x 16 D, maximum 35 H x 21.5 W x 16 D inches. Seat area 12” W. Child Seated Shoulder Height: 15 21.5 inches.
feature_bullets: Easy installation: Color coded belt guides ensure proper seat belt positioning and the push button lower connectors secure the booster seat to the vehicle when not in use
Ride comfortably: 10 Position quick adjust headrest grows along with your child and soft, breathable knit fabrics keep your child comfortable
Surrounded in safety: 3 layers of side impact protection featuring external impact cushions
Removable Cup Holders: Keep drinks and snacks close at hand; Dishwasher safe

Fits: Forward facing 40 to 120 pounds, child height 38 to 63 inches; Dimensions: Minimum 27.5 x 21.5 x 16 inches (HxWxD), Maximum 35 x 21.5 x 16 inches (HxWxD); Seat area: 12 inches W; Child Seated Shoulder Height: 15 to 21.5 inches
